titleStmt.title: The practical believer, or, The articles of the Apostles Creed drawn out to form a true Christian's heart and practice in two parts.
titleStmt.author: Kettlewell, John, 1653-1695.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Kettlewell and are to be sold by the booksellers of London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: Other eds. show author's name on t.p.
Each part has special t.p. and separate pagination.
Advertisement: preliminary p. [1] and p. [1]-[2] at end.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
